segments.text: Do you want to hang out tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I can't . I have a date !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This girl I've been chatting with for the past couple of months . She's really cool and she's driving over here this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a minute , you mean you met her online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ! I signed up for a website called match @ . com and it is great ! You fill in all your details and preferences , like if you are a smoker or if you have any pets . Then you find people that have similar characteristics and you can email them or chat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is kind of weird ! What if she is a psycho or something like that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's the same as meeting people anywhere and dating them ! I am just tired of going to bars or being set up for dates by my friends ! I think this is a really cool alternative , especially if you are a bit shy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess it does seem logical . I'll have to check it out !
segments.speaker: S1
